meanings.definition: A tall plant with large, colorful flowers.
meanings.sent1: The hollyhock in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted a beautiful hollyhock in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the hollyhock as a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bloomed like a hollyhock in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hollyhock stood out among the other flowers.

meanings.sent1: Each hollyhock blossom was a different shade of pink.
meanings.sent2: The bees buzzed around the hollyhock, collecting nectar.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fairy sat on the hollyhock petal, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a hollyhock in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate hollyhock petals danced in the wind.
